recommended_actions.description: R session costs elevated post-gap: s1472=$2.39, s1477=$2.81, s1482=$2.56. Pre-gap R sessions were consistently $1.1-1.5. This is a 70-80% increase. The scope per session has increased (completing directives, slimming docs, pipeline changes) which may justify it, but worth monitoring to ensure it doesn't become structural.
recommended_actions.action: Monitor next 3 R sessions. If all >$2.00, investigate whether R session prompt changes (R#252 raised pipeline supply target) are causing scope creep. If R avg stays >$2.00 for 2 more audits, consider adding a soft budget note to SESSION_REFLECT.md.
